author: Science X staff
description: A new analysis of observed temperatures shows the Arctic is heating up more than four times faster than the rate of global warming. The trend has stepped upward steeply twice in the last 50 years, a finding missed by all but four of 39 climate models.
title: Arctic temperatures are increasing four times faster than global warming
